mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM as rn FROM ( SELECT d.delivery_code, d.order_date, d.dedt, COUNT(i.product_code) AS delivery_qy FROM delivery d JOIN delivery_details i ON d.delivery_code = i.delivery_code WHERE d.company_se = 'CP02' AND i.delivery_qy > 0 GROUP BY d.delivery_code, d.order_date, d.dedt ORDER BY d.delivery_code )a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end}) page WHERE page.rn >= #{start}
select count(delivery_code) from delivery WHERE company_se = 'CP02'

SELECT p.product_code, p.product_name, SUM(d.delivery_qy) as productQy, SUM(DISTINCT i.store_qy) as totalQy, SUM(e.error_qy) as errorTotalQy FROM delivery_details d join product_info p on d.product_code = p.product_code left join inventory i on d.delivery_code = i.delivery_code left join inventory_error e on i.lot = e.lot WHERE d.product_se = 'PT02' AND d.delivery_code = #{deliveryCode} group by p.product_code, p.product_name
SELECT get_comm(product_size) as product_size_info FROM product_option WHERE product_code = #{productCode} GROUP BY product_size ORDER BY product_size
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inventory(lot, product_code, store_qy, inventory_qy, product_color, product_size, store_charger, storage_location, store_date, product_se, delivery_code) VALUES(concat(TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyyMMdd'),LPAD(inventory_lot_seq.nextval, 4,'0')), #{list.productCode}, #{list.productQy}, #{list.productQy}, #{list.color}, #{list.sizeCode}, #{name}, 'test', sysdate, 'PT02', #{list.deliveryCode})
